cutoff_time.label: Cut-off time
cutoff_time.comment: If a request is made for the delivery options between Friday after, and Monday before, cut-off time then Tuesday will be shown as the next possible delivery date.

monday_delivery_active.label: Monday delivery
monday_delivery_active.comment: Note: Monday delivery is only possible when the package is delivered before 15.00 on Saturday at the designated PostNL locations. Click here for more information concerning Monday delivery and the locations.

saturday_cutoff_time.label: Monday delivery cut-off time
saturday_cutoff_time.comment: If a request is made before this time on Saturday, Monday will be shown as the next possible delivery date.

dropoff_delay.label: Dropoff-delay
dropoff_delay.comment: This options allows you to set the number of days it takes you to pick, pack and hand in your parcels at PostNL when ordered before the cutoff time.

font_size.label: Font size
font_size.comment: Leave blank to automatically determine the font size

toggle_options.label: Toggle options
toggle_options.comment: When loading the checkout hide options (used by parnis.nl)

delivery.label: Delivery
delivery.comment: To determine the base price you have to navigate in the menu to Shipping Methods.

age_check.label: Age check 18+
age_check.comment: The age 18+ check is intended for parcel shipments for which the recipient must show 18+ by means of a proof of identity. With this shipping option "Signature for receipt" and "Delivery only at recipient" are included. The age 18+ is further excluded from the delivery options morning and evening delivery.

standard_delivery_titel.label: Standard delivery title
standard_delivery_titel.comment: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

only_recipient_active.label: Home address only
only_recipient_active.comment: Deliver the package only at address of the intended recipient

only_recipient_fee.label: Home address only fee
only_recipient_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

signature_fee.label: Signature on receipt fee
signature_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

signature_and_only_recipient_fee.label: Home address only and signature on receipt together fee
signature_and_only_recipient_fee.comment: If both have been selected this price will be added to the regular shipping price. Leave empty for not using it.

mailbox_title.label: Mailbox title
mailbox_title.comment: Leave blank to automate mailbox packets only in the backend

mailbox_weight.label: Mailbox weight
mailbox_weight.comment: Besides assigning weights to all products, you can also specify a volume of each product.

mailbox_fee.label: Mailbox fee
mailbox_fee.comment: Enter a basic price for a mailbox. The regular price will not affect this price.

morning_delivery_not_active_holder.label: Morning delivery active
morning_delivery_not_active_holder.comment: Not possible if age check is active

morning_delivery_titel.label: Morning delivery title
morning_delivery_titel.comment: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

morning_delivery_fee.label: Morning delivery fee
morning_delivery_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

eveningdelivery_not_active_holder.label: Evening delivery active
eveningdelivery_not_active_holder.comment: Not possible if age check is active

eveningdelivery_titel.label: Evening delivery title
eveningdelivery_titel.comment: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

eveningdelivery_fee.label: Evening delivery fee
eveningdelivery_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

pickup_fee.label: Pickup fee
pickup_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

pickup_express_active.label: Early morning pick up points active

pickup_express_not_active_holder.label: Early morning pick up points active
pickup_express_not_active_holder.comment: Not possible if Pickup at PostNL location is not active

pickup_express_fee.label: Early morning pick up points fee
pickup_express_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

belgium_standard_delivery_titel.label: Belgium standard delivery title
belgium_standard_delivery_titel.comment: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

pickup_belgium_fee.label: Pickup Belgium fee
pickup_belgium_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

api.label: API settings
api.comment: To get your personal API credentials you should contact us.

print_orientation.label: Print Orientation
print_orientation.comment: Select a standard orientation for printing labels.

tracktrace_template.label: Track&Trace email template
tracktrace_template.comment: You can create a new transactional e-mail where the variables {{var tracktrace_url}} and {{var retourlabel_url}} are available. TIP: You can base them on the Order Update template, because {{var order}} is also available.
tracktrace_template.tooltip: Select a transactional e-mail template to send the barcode

always_postnl.label: Always use PostNL
always_postnl.comment: Select 'No' in order to set the shipping methods that must be regarded as PostNL.

postnl_shipping_methods.label: PostNL shipping methods
postnl_shipping_methods.tooltip: Please select the shipping methods that will be considered to be 'PostNL' by this extension. Orders placed using one of these shipping methods may be processed using the PostNL extension.

pakjegemak_use_shipment_address.label: Use shipment address for PostNL location
pakjegemak_use_shipment_address.comment: Use shipment address for 'Ophalen op een PostNL locatie'. The customer will see the address on the invoice. Set to 'No' if you are using AfterPay.

show_delivery_date_on_invoice.label: Show delivery date on invoice
show_delivery_date_on_invoice.comment: Show delivery date on invoice, packing slip, user account and Magento confirmation mail

use_filter.label: Use filter in order overview
use_filter.comment: Select 'No' if you are using a plugin that is present in the order summary and therefore experience problems.

ssl_handshake.label: Force unencrypted PostNL connection
ssl_handshake.comment: By enabling this, you will force connection to the PostNL platform over unsecured http, rather than https
ssl_handshake.tooltip: In some cases the SSL certification can't be validated, which can lead to problems connection to the PostNL platform. Only use this if you are aware that all communication to PostNL will be sent over the unsecure https protocol.

shipment.label: Default Shipment Settings
shipment.comment:
Fill in your preferences for a shipment. These settings will only apply for the mass actions in the order grid. When creating a single shipment, these settings can be changed manually.
These settings will activate based on the order total amount. When shipping outside of the EU you can set default values for customs type and customs goods HS code.

home_address_only.label: Home address only
home_address_only.comment: Shipments will not be delivered at the neighbours, only on house address.

return_if_no_answer.label: Return if no answer
return_if_no_answer.comment: Shipments will not go the a pickup point but will be returned directly after multiple delivery attempts.

insured_250.label: Insured up to € 250
insured_250.comment: For NL shipping only, shipments outside the EU insured default is € 200

insured_500.label: Insured up to € 500
insured_500.comment: For NL shipping only, shipments inside the EU insured default is € 500

automatically_next_status.label: Automatically next status
automatically_next_status.comment: Turn the order automatically to the next status after creating a label

customs_type.label: Customs Shipment Type
customs_type.comment: Default shipment type for Cross Domestic shipments

customs_hstariffnr.label: Customs Content HS Code
customs_hstariffnr.comment: Default content type for Cross Domestic products, see https://tarief.douane.nl/. HS codes can also be connected to categories. The data you enter here will be used as default.

prefix_street2_international_addresses.label: Prefix 2nd field
prefix_street2_international_addresses.comment: Prefix the address with the 2nd field for the following countries; CN, FR, GR, IE, IL, JP, LU, MY, MA, NZ, SG, GB, US, VS
